english.segment1: Oh no, this couldn't be more unexpected. And I can tell you I've been moving in so slow. Don't let it throw you off too far. Cause I'll be running right behind you
english.segment2: Could this be out of line? (Could this be out of line). To say you're the only one breaking me down like this. You're the only one I would take a shot on. Keep me hanging on so contagiously
english.segment3: Oohhh, when I'm around you I'm predictable. Cause I believe in loving you with first sight. I know it's crazy but I'm hoping to.. To take a hold of you
english.segment4: Could this be out of line? (Could this be out of line). To say you're the only one breaking me down like this. You're the only one I would take a shot on. Keep me hanging on so contagiously
english.segment5: Oh you're everything I'm wanting. Come to think of it, I'm aching. On account of my transgression.. Will you welcome this confession?
english.segment6: Could this be out of line? (Could this be out of line). To say you're the only one breaking me down like this. You're the only one I would take a shot on. Keep me hanging on so contagiously
